content.text: Match ends, Lyon 1, FC Schalke 04 0.
Second Half ends, Lyon 1, FC Schalke 04 0.
Attempt missed. Lisandro López (Lyon) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Kim Källström.
Substitution, Lyon. Kim Källström replaces Jimmy Briand.
Attempt blocked. Jean Makoun (Lyon) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jérémy Pied.
Foul by Lukas Schmitz (FC Schalke 04).
